entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2025-04-12
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • dotnet completions script produces confusing error when no shell supplied #48420
  • ConfigureAwaitOptions_AsyncTaskMethodBuilderT&ConfiguredTaskAwaiter_The configuration issue of 'ConfigureAwaitOptions' option in the subsequent code after await #48418

PullRequests

Created

  • Remove emsdk sb intermediate from Version.Details.xml #48419
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

Merged

  • Copy logs on failure in vmr-join-verticals.yml #48417
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

Updated

  • --interactive should actually default to true in user-facing situations. #48353
    untriaged, Area-CLI
  • Re-Bootstrap Source Build to .NET 10.0.100-preview.4.25210.1 #48395
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Use Arcade's publishing logic to publish a given VMR vertical #47076
    untriaged, Area-VMR
  • Add /t:CompareCliSnapshots and /t:UpdateCliSnapshots #48396
    Area-Infrastructure
